metadata.title: CVE-2021-22060 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Spring Framework versions 5.3.0 - 5.3.13, 5.2.0 - 5.2.18, and olderunsupported versions, it is possible for a user to provide malicious inputto cause the insertion of additional log entries. This is a follow-up toCVE-2021-22096 that protects against additional types of input and in moreplaces of the Spring Framework codebase.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
